meanings.definition: Stanols: A group of saturated sterols found in plants and animals.
meanings.sent1: The stanols in the plants help them grow strong and healthy.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the stanols in animals to learn more about their biology.
meanings.sent3: The stanols in the forest were having a party, celebrating their role in nature.
meanings.sent4: The stanols stood tall like guardians, protecting the plants and animals in the ecosystem.
meanings.sent5: I imagined the stanols as tiny superheroes, defending the forest from harm.

meanings.definition: Stanols: Compounds that can help lower cholesterol levels in the body.
meanings.sent1: Eating foods rich in stanols can be beneficial for your health.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often recommend stanols as part of a balanced diet to improve heart health.
meanings.sent3: The stanols in the kitchen pantry were gossiping about their cholesterol-lowering powers.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to lower cholesterol was as strong as the effect of stanols on the body.
meanings.sent5: The image of stanols working like tiny cleaners, scrubbing away cholesterol, stuck in my mind.
